short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows SCRT price from CoinGecko in a browser toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show small SCRT button in browser toolbar with price update each minute from CoinGecko API. If hovered over the button shows: 24h price change, 24h volume, marketcap.
